body_html:
We do have windows continuous tests setup and running on our own test infrastructure.
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-gpu-cmake/
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-master-win-cmake-py/

We might be lacking firsthand windows development machines for quickly debugging these. but the test infra is there.
Closing the issue.

body:
We do have windows continuous tests setup and running on our own test infrastructure.
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-gpu-cmake/
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-master-win-cmake-py/

We might be lacking firsthand windows development machines for quickly debugging these. but the test infra is there.
Closing the issue.
